thread.title: DreamWorks Seeks $400 Million Financing

author: Ben Fritz
title: DreamWorks Seeks $400 Million Financing
text:
For Steven Spielberg, it’s back to the future.
Coming off a huge payday from this summer’s “Jurassic World,” Hollywood’s most powerful director is preparing to return to his old stomping grounds at Universal Pictures, recharge his Amblin Entertainment production label and raise about $400 million for his struggling company DreamWorks SKG,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
